body_html:
@yuefengz and @drpngx - here's what I'm seeing from nvidia-smi
when I run KMeansClustering without the MirroredStrategy

All four GPUs have a Python process on them, but only one seems
to perform any computation.

If I do run training with MirroredStrategy, then training crashes and
I get the above mentioned Error message, namely:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda3/envs/tensorflow_p36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/ops.py", line 1567, in _create_c_op
    c_op = c_api.TF_FinishOperation(op_desc)
tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.InvalidArgumentError: Shape must be rank 1 but is rank 2 for 'cond/cond_1/concat' (op: 'ConcatV2') with input shapes: [0], [?,806], [].
body_text:
@yuefengz and @drpngx - here's what I'm seeing from nvidia-smi
when I run KMeansClustering without the MirroredStrategy
All four GPUs have a Python process on them, but only one seems
to perform any computation.

If I do run training with MirroredStrategy, then training crashes and
I get the above mentioned Error message, namely:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda3/envs/tensorflow_p36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/ops.py", line 1567, in _create_c_op
    c_op = c_api.TF_FinishOperation(op_desc)
tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.InvalidArgumentError: Shape must be rank 1 but is rank 2 for 'cond/cond_1/concat' (op: 'ConcatV2') with input shapes: [0], [?,806], [].
body:
@yuefengz and @drpngx - here's what I'm seeing from `nvidia-smi`
when I run `KMeansClustering` without the `MirroredStrategy`

All four GPUs have a Python process on them, but only one seems
to perform any computation.

![kmeans-gpu](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8389864/43524458-fc90b54c-9564-11e8-98af-d7fd83197933.png)

If I do run training with `MirroredStrategy`, then training crashes and
I get the above mentioned Error message, namely:

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda3/envs/tensorflow_p36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/ops.py", line 1567, in _create_c_op
    c_op = c_api.TF_FinishOperation(op_desc)
tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.InvalidArgumentError: Shape must be rank 1 but is rank 2 for 'cond/cond_1/concat' (op: 'ConcatV2') with input shapes: [0], [?,806], [].
```
